00122         template <typename T> void setParameter(const ParameterMap &parms,
00123                                                 T &parm,
00124                                                 const std::string &key) {
00125             std::cerr<< "Function::SetParameter(";
00126             for (ParameterMap::const_iterator i = parameters.begin();
00127                  i != parms.end(); ++i) {
00128                 std::cerr << i->second->getName() << ", " << T(*(i->second));
00129                 if (i->second->getName() == key) parm = T(*(i->second));
00130             }
00131             std::cerr << ", " << parm << ", " << key << ") \n";
00132         }

00186 template <typename T> inline
00187         void Function::declareParameter(const std::string &_name,
00188                                         const T &_default) {
00189             parameterNames.push_back(_name);
00190             if (parameters.find(_name) == parameters.end()) {
00191                 insertParameter(
00192                     std::make_pair(_name,
00193                         ParameterFactory::Instance().
00194                             createParameterWithDefault(_name, _default)));
00195             }
00196         }
00197 
00199 template <typename T> inline
00200         void Function::declareParameter(const std::string &_name,
00201                                         const T &_default, const T &_value) {
00202             parameterNames.push_back(_name);
00203             if (parameters.find(_name) == parameters.end()) {
00204                 insertParameter(
00205                     std::make_pair(_name,
00206                         ParameterFactory::Instance().
00207                             createParameterWithDefault(_name, _default)));
00208                 parameters[_name]->setValue(new FunctionParameterValue<T>(_value));
00209             }
00210         }
